ActJudges Act
SubjectElspeth J. Hogg ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Stanton B. Hogg **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to ELSPETH J. HOGG, widow of the Hon. Stanton B. Hogg, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective April 15, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
